greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = c(0)*p(0) + ... + c(n)*p(n), where c(i) = 1 if a(i-1) < p(i) and c(i) = -1 if a(i-1) >= p(i) (p(0) = 1, p(i) = prime(i)).
comment: Alternative definition: a(0)=1; thereafter a(n) = a(n-1) + prime(n) if a(n-1) < prime(n), otherwise a(n) = a(n-1) - prime(n). Cf. A008348. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 31 2019
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
ext: Missing a(46)=94 inserted and name corrected by _Sean A. Irvine_, May 21 2019
